detailText.detailText:
Data security is a matter of trust. Unitz is aware that the security of your information & identity is especially important. Therefore, we are committed to using the information you provide in the manner set forth in this Privacy Policy.

1. Purpose

We will collect necessary and relevant information about the transaction between us and you.

Purpose of collecting customer information:

- Contact to confirm when you order the service.

- Provide information related to services provided by Unitz and Unitz's support policy.

- Process requests for services and information through our application and website at your request.

- In addition, we use the information you provide to support customer account management: confirm and perform financial transactions related to your online payments through the application; check data downloaded from our website; improve the interface or content of the pages on the application & website to make it easier for customers to use; identify visitors to websites & apps; send you information that we think will be useful or requested by you, including information about products and services, provided you agree not to object to being contacted for the above purposes.

- We use cookies and other tracking technology to collect certain information when you interact on the Unitz website & app for advertising purposes & product editing to enhance the experience.

From other sources

When we collect personal data from other sources, we ensure that such data is transferred to us in accordance with applicable law. These sources include:

- From referral programs;

- From our business partners, such as consumer service partners, psychology, payment service providers, testing service providers,...;

- Insurance and financial providers;

- publicly available data;

- Government data sources;

- Marketing service provider or partner.

2. Scope of information use

By using the Application, you acknowledge that we have the right to use the following system APIs to access data on your phone: (1) Read and write to phone book, (2) Get location your current knowledge with consent, (3) Accessing the Internet from your device. All of these accesses are made by us only with your consent, so you acknowledge that, once you have granted us permission, you will not have any claim against such access. access this.

You also accept to receive media messages, advertising services from Official Account Unitz and Unitz Co., Ltd.

- We also collect the following information from you:

Personal information: including information you provide to us to confirm your account such as name, phone number, identity card number, email address;

General information: Information about your phone configuration, the version of the Application you are using;

Your Location Information: Your geo-location data will be stored on a server to help you use the search function of the Application.

Phone Book: We will store your phone book on the server to best support you in using the App or you lose your data. We undertake not to use your phone book for any purpose without your consent;

We do not use any means to track the content of messages, exchanges or other means to track users when using this Application.

3. Update personal information changes

We are committed to keeping your information for as long as required by law or for the purpose for which it was collected.

You can update your personal information at any time by logging into the Unitz website & application and please notify us of the change to best support you in the process of using the service. .

You need to ensure that information is accessed confidentially and not disclosed to an unauthorized third party. We will not be responsible for the misuse of a password unless it is our fault.

4. Protect customer information

Unitz ensures that all information collected will be kept secure. The collection and use of user information is done only with the consent of the user, unless otherwise provided by law. We protect your personal information by:

- Limit access to personal information.

- Using the highest security technology product to prevent unauthorized access to the internal data management system.

- Delete all your personal information when it is no longer needed for our data storage purposes.

- We do not sell, exchange or transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties that support them

nodes.shortText: What is the problem you are facing?

longText.longText:
Failure in love, broken marriage, career, career difficulties, ... and there are dozens of other problems that you encounter, every day you have to find a way to solve them.

You want to find a way for yourself, or simply want someone to talk to.

We bring you a whole new experience, a conversation that contains many interesting things, and a little spice of humor if it is too intense?

If you are curious how will you be when you go a different path now, a change in appearance, or the arrangement of items in the house will turn you into a person like this?

Come to Unitz! The results may surprise you!
We will work with you to solve daily problems, all your suggestions will make us better and better to serve you better.

1. About the app

Unitz is a mobile app on the platform is a connection between the experts in each industry and users or customers in Vietnam. The application uses personal information (phone number, personal email and list) as a foundation with the main features:

- Chat video call, call to chat directly with leading experts

- Sharing information and experiences in the fields of health, education, business investment, performance, lifestyle

- Server server: Google cloud is located outside.

Explanation of words:

- Customers: are individuals who use Unitz .'s services

- Partner: is the person who teaches the skills at Unitz to provide services based on Unitz's software development platform for customers.

- User: Both customers and partners

- Document: is the files about write audio, the paper, etc ... can be heard, read, viewed.

- Evidence: Evidence in civil work is anything real that is approved and collected by other agencies, organizations or individuals at transaction facilities or presented to the Court during processing or collected by the Court. automatically, the procedure prescribed by this Code and used as a basis for determining the client's situation of the task as well as determining the request or response of the matter is grounded and the cooperation . 

2. Update

The updated version will supersede the terms and conditions in the original agreement. You can visit the application or the website above to see the details of the version update. Fptshop.com.vn

3. Application owner

This application is developed and owned by Unitz Ltd., all intellectual property rights related to the Application (including but not limited to source code, images, data, information, content contained included in the application; additions, modifications, updates to the application) and related manuals (if any) will be owned solely by Unitz Co., Ltd. and no individual or organization is authorized to do so. Licence reproduces, reproduces, distributes, or otherwise formats to the extent of its owner's rights without the prior written consent and permission of Unitz Ltd.

4. Account

To use the application, you must create an account according to our instructions, you commit that the use of the account must comply with the regulations of Unitz Co., Ltd. provided to us is accurate, complete at the time requested. Each instructor can only create one account, cannot register more than once, the person chatting information must be identified accurately and honestly, especially it is forbidden for a chat person to create many different accounts and provide fake information. If issued by Unitz will permanently delete the account and not be able to use Unitz's services again forever. All your rights and obligations will be based on the information account you have registered, so if there is any wrong information we will not be responsible in case that information affects the information. enjoy or limit your benefits.

Unitz encourages each week, or a fixed time, that the author signs up for a job that can be for a week or a month (tentative) at Unitz's app. When the partner is busy at the time that the customer has booked with you, you have the right to proactively notify the customer and move to another session more convenient for the partner.

When the partner wants to change the price of the service they provide, the partner must notify Unitz before the 25th of the previous month, and the price will be updated on the 1st of the following month. A partner can only change the price once a month.

You have the right to use the Application and other services we provide, but such use will not include the following acts without the written consent of Unitz Ltd.:

- Copy, repair, reproduce the new product or regenerate the version on the Unitz base application;

- Sell, transfer, sublicense, disclose or otherwise convert or make available part or all of the Application to any third party;

- Use the application to provide services to any third parties (organizations, individuals) for business purposes, gain profit and/or violate relevant and applicable Vietnamese laws;

- Move, remove, change any legitimate notices or features of the application (including but not limited to copyright statements);

- Redesign, compile, remove, edit, reverse the design of the application or content application;

- Change or cancel the initial state of the application;

- Use the application to perform any actions that harm the security network of Unitz Co., Ltd., including but not limited to using data or accessing the server system network to delete, edit corrections and add information; maliciously distribute programs, viruses, or perform any other actions aimed at harming or destroying the network system;

- Log in and use the application using a compatible third-party software or system not developed, licensed or approved by Unitz Ltd.

- Other than the scope of format prescribed by relevant and current Vietnamese laws.

Users are solely responsible for the content they share and give their opinions, discussions and opinions on Unitz's application. Unitz Company Limited is not responsible for any such content posted and/or shared by users.

Unitz Ltd. reserves the right to remove any content that we believe violates the above provisions without being responsible for the failure of the user.

5. Regulations on calendar registration with customers' partners

The customer is entitled to register the program separately with the partner (but must be consistent with the partner's program). In case the customer has busy work to export at the preset time, the customer must notify at least 2 hours clock, and 24 hours multi-clock to Unitz's partner. If out this time client will have to be pay for the job not message up to the counter.

Optional case by case how many days the schedule will move back.

But the Maximum time length is used as after:

The maximum extension time is 20% to 25% of the time the customer has booked with the partner (For example, the customer has registered for 2 months of study with the partner, but is busy for one session in the 2 month period, then the maximum time that a customer can extend is 1 month + 1 week)

Customers are allowed up to 3 times the maximum extension time, but the aggregate time must match from 20-25% of the above stretching time.

6. Compliance

Customers must abide by the terms and conditions of using the application issued by Unitz Co., Ltd.

The following terms are prohibited when conversing between clients and instructors:

- Consulting on legal issues, tax, disease diagnosis, medical examination, various legal regulations is not allowed

- Advice to change something or a job.

- Issues related to human life and death.

- Issues related to stocks, gambling, investment projects.

- What are the problems about the exam, the test, its content.

- Issues related to finding people and missing people.

- Problems with furniture, lost property.

- Issues of scope, ethical scope, cultural communication system of Vietnam.

- Collect information of the same service business chat house as Unitz, or similar operators that Unitz Ltd. discovered.

- Personal issues that are contrary to morals, family sentiments.

7. Prohibited acts for the speaker (partner)

This violates the agreement.

Acts of law, court regulations, legally enforceable definitions or orders or administrative measures, executive advertisements, criminal orientations or incentives, or acts , expression other vi range.

Acts that are or may be offensive to Vietnamese culture and ethics (there are images and expressions when calling that offend customers).

The scope of activities or promotion of goods ranges to property, project listings, credits, privacy rights, copyrights, trademarks, intellectual property or rights related to the company, third parties, customer, chat person

The act of using multiple accounts at the same time, the act of sharing the same account with others and/or other third parties, or the act of lending to a third party as a user.

Acts of impersonating another person or a third party

The act of collecting or disclosing personal information, registering information, using history, ... propaganda targets, transmitting information that is not in line with the original goals of Unitz.

8. Range handling

In the event that you violate any of the provisions of this agreement, Unitz Ltd. has the right to immediately lock your account and/or delete all information, scope of content, and property rights. substance, to the extent you will be liable to the competent authority, Unitz Ltd. and third parties for any damages resulting from or resulting from your conduct.

9. Regulations on e-wallets

The recharge available to the e-wallet on Unitz's application will create favorable conditions for the User, maximizing the benefits of non-cash payment.

Users can top up the e-wallet by linking the card signal, international debit card (Credit/Debit from Visa/Mastercard/JCB/Amex), wire transfer, or other formats supported by Unitz.

The balance on the wallet is used to pay the fees of the service packages set up on the Unitz App and is not exchangeable for cash or other transfers.

10. Demarcation of responsibilities between partners and customers in solving problems arising from transactions made on the website

If any problems arise from the customer, Unitz and its business partners are responsible for receiving complaints and supporting users related to the unitz.com.vn website

Unitz is the unit that receives inquiries and complaints from customers via email and phone published on the website.

In case customers' questions and complaints are within Unitz's ability and right to resolve, we will actively contact and answer for customers. In this case, we will not be able to notify the competent State agency to resolve and provide information support.

In case of customer's questions and complaints directly related to the quality and service of the partner with Unitz, Unitz will confirm the partner's information, and within 7 days, the partner needs to notify to Unitz. Unitz knows about the progress of customer inquiries and complaints. In the event of a conflict that is the fault of a partner of Unitz, we will take action to warn, lock the account or transfer it to a competent legal authority depending on the seriousness of the violation. Unitz Co., Ltd. will terminate and remove all news articles about that partner's products and services on unitz.com.vn and request the partner to adequately reimburse customers on the basis of an agreement with the customer. row.

If through an agreement, it is still not possible to resolve the conflict arising from the transaction between the two parties, one of the two parties will have the right to ask a competent legal authority to intervene to ensure the legitimate interests of the two parties. law of the parties, especially for customers.

Unitz's partners need to be responsible for providing documents certifying information related to the conflicting incident for customers. Unitz will be responsible for providing information related to users and partners if requested by users or partners (in relation to such dispute). After the parties have resolved the dispute, they are responsible for reporting it to Unitz.

11. Complaint handling

Unitz is always responsible for receiving and handling customer complaints related to the unitz.com.vn e-commerce trading floor. When complaints and disputes arise, Unitz promotes negotiation and mediation between the parties in order to maintain the relationship and trust of customers in Unitz's service quality.

Objects of complaint

- Package Service users:

- The individual named in the section who has paid for the Unitz application, the individual who has an account and uses the application of Unitz Co., Ltd.

- Individuals sign a contract or agreement to use the service with Unitz Co., Ltd.

- The legal representative of the service user, including:

- Legal representative

- Father and mother towards minor children

- Guardian for wards

- The person appointed by law to represent the person with restricted civil act capacity.

- Other people as prescribed by law.

- Authorized representative Individuals, legal representatives may authorize others to make complaints. The authorization shall comply with the provisions of law.

Complaint process

This is done in 3 steps:

Step 1: Customer/Partner makes a complaint to Unitz's customer care department according to one of the steps below, accompanied by evidence that there is a violation of ethical principles, terms and conditions issued by Unitz.

Step 2: Within 7 working days, Unitz will verify the incident and confirm the compensation or not with the customer/partner.

Step 3: Unitz will ask partners/customers to provide information and evidence related to the transaction, to verify and clarify the case and take appropriate action.

In the event that Unitz has made efforts to resolve complaints and disputes, but the matter is beyond Unitz's capacity and competence, Unitz will request the customer/partner to bring the case to the competent State agency for settlement according to the law. provisions of law.

Unitz respects and strictly implements the provisions of the law on protecting the consumer's rights of customers (consumers). Therefore, it is recommended that partners on the Unitz.vn e-commerce platform provide complete, accurate, honest and detailed information related to products and services. All acts of fraud and fraud in business are condemned and must be fully responsible before the law.

Parties including Partners - service sellers, Customers - service buyers have an important and responsible role in actively resolving the matter. The Partner should be responsible for providing documents, documents, papers, and other evidences to prove and clarify information related to the event that is causing conflicts for the Client. Upon request, Unitz will provide information related to the Buyer service and the Seller of the service if so agreed by such Buyer or Seller (in connection with the dispute) or to the extent permitted by law.

In the event that the transaction generates a complaint or dispute that is determined to be an error of the service seller, Unitz will take measures to warn, lock the account or transfer it to the competent State agency for handling according to the appropriate level. bad range. Unitz will terminate and remove all information about that Seller's services on Unitz.vn and ask the Seller to compensate the satisfied Customer on the basis of the Customer's satisfaction. have tried to solve through commercial, agreement but still can not solve the problem arising from the transaction between the Customer and the Seller, then either the Customer and the Seller will be able to provide services to a competent State agency for settlement in order to ensure the legitimate interests of the parties.

Any controversy, claim or dispute arising out of or in connection with transactions on the Website or these terms and conditions shall be resolved by commercial, conciliation, arbitration and/or court. according to the Law on Protection of User Rights 2010, in Chapter 4 on Settlement of disputes between users and organizations and individuals trading in goods and services.

One. When there is any complaint about Unitz's service, users can use 1 of 2 ways:

Email: hi@unitz.app

The “help and review” section on the Unitz app.

Unitz will directly deal with customer complaints

In case a customer / partner complains about the operating mode of the author (games) / customer of Unitz, Unitz will resolve the complaint by making compensation according to Unitz's policy or taking it to the authorities. related to the concurrent work Unitz will handle.

In addition, if there are insults, use of harsh words, and users touch the scope, Unitz recommends that users report it directly to the relevant authorities directly according to the current law.

12. Common Policy

Usually the policy is implemented in the following steps:

Step 1: User complains to Unitz with proof of work

Step 2: Unitz will verify the work, investigate the information provided from the Client and the person working in the complaint work.

Step 3: Unitz informs the User about the proposed resolution within 1 to 7 working days from the date of receipt of the Customer's complaint. Maximum time limit for complaints is 02 months for customers.

Step 4: In the event that the information contract determines that the error belongs to the chater, Unitz is responsible for indemnifying the Customer Up to 100% of the service that the customer returns to the chater. Unitz will take action against people who chat according to Unitz's regulations.

Policy to protect the interests of profit users:

The admin floor requires individuals when registering as a member, to provide all relevant personal information such as: Full name, contact address, email, phone, ..., and is responsible for the legal feature of the information on. The Unitz.vn management board is also not responsible for not resolving all claims related to the interests of that buyer if he personally finds that all information provided by that buyer at the initial registration is not. exactly. The buyer has the right to directly complain and claim compensation against the relevant seller in the event that the product or service provided by the seller does not meet the quality requirements as announced. The Unitz.vn trading floor always ensures important interests, claims for buyers from sellers who provide products and services to ensure legal rights for users in related fields. beneficial effects on buyers.

All routines policy will be updated regularly at website web.unitz.app

longText.longText:
About Unit

Unitz is a mobile application, on the basis of connecting teachers in any field with students all over the world. Unitz can be accessed from devices with Internet connectivity, such as personal computers, tablets and smartphones. After registering, teachers can create a profile revealing information about themselves.

They can make video calls, audio calls and share screens with students who have joined their class. Students can also communicate directly with each other and with teachers. Teachers can also join groups class, and receive notifications on the studying activities of their students they teach

The founders have more than 13 years of experience in the Vietnamese market, more than 10 years of product development cooperation with Apple. They have worked for more than ten years in the European market for leading multinational corporations. In addition, the experience in the Vietnam market is managing more than 150 employees and operating in many fields.

Our Goal and vision

Not only with the education sector, UNITZ's goal is a Live, Online, Paid, Multidisciplinary Video Platform. This means Unitz will be a place where customers, any people who have need, can connect with professionals, teachers, artists, instructors, celebrities who are successful in many fields like Performance, Lifestyle, Financial Business, Education, etc.

Nhằm tạo ra một hệ sinh thái đa dạng giữa thị trường công nghệ hiện nay và sử dụng dễ dàng hơn khi dùng ứng dụng, hãy đến với cẩm nang Unitz!\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

longText.longText:
1. 1. Can I register many users with one account?

No. Currently 1 account can only be used by 1 person. If a partner violates Unitz's terms, conditions and policies, they may be fined and lead to a permanent account lockout

2. Do I need to be online all the time? If I am not online for a long time, how long will my account be locked?

No. Flexible teaching time according to the partner's time. That means we don't enforce fixed uptime. However, if your online frequency is too low, students can go in and choose another teacher. Therefore, we recommend that you have a specific and regular schedule of activities.

3. Can I cancel a class?

Yes. If the time the student calls you is not within your free time. Or the call is not on the schedule.

Tip: You can text back to your students: “I'm busy right now… you can call me… ..Thank you for trusting and choosing me” Or you can talk to students to make up another time if you are busy on a scheduled day

4. If I work in another organization, can I be contracted?

For us, the answer is yes.

However, you should review your employment contract with the other organization. see if that organization has any obligations, such as not working outside of their own organization, not joining another organization, not appearing on a different platform as a teacher and other constraints. Besides, you must comply with Unitz's technology information security policy and privacy statements.

5. What is my information used for?

First, your information will be managed and secured by us. This information helps to authenticate the teacher's account to avoid technology crime.

Second, information about your name and image will be displayed on our website and application. By this way, students who visit our website or app can see you.

Third, if there are any legal problems, you will be protected by the law.
6. How long is the cooperation program between Unitz and partners?

The period of cooperation is indefinite. If teachers want to stop cooperating, they must notify Unitz at least 30 days in advance.

nodes.name: FAQItem7
nodes.shortText: I want to know how to cancel my reservation ?

richText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

longText.longText: I want to know how to cancel my reservation ?

detailText.detailText:
Cancellations can be made at least 2 hours in advance and up to 24 hours in advance. If outside this time, the customer will have to pay a fee for not notifying the partner in time.

Depending on the field, the service package will be different, for the service package with pre-registered time to learn:

- The maximum extension time is 20% to 25% of the time the customer has booked with the partner (For example, the customer has registered for 2 months of study with the partner, but is busy once in a 2 month period. , the maximum time that a customer can extend is 1 month + 1 week)

- Customers can extend the time up to 3 times, but the total extension time must be suitable from 20-25% of the time above.

nodes.name: FAQItem11
nodes.shortText: Can I end the call while talking to a consultant?

longText.longText:
You can end the conversation early, however when you are done please tell the consultant you want to end early and hang up.

As for payment, since you have scheduled your appointment within our allotted time frame, you will pay the same amount for the call as you previously booked, and we will not give you a refund.

nodes.name: AdvisorRegisterFAQsItem8
nodes.shortText: How long is the cooperation program between Unitz and partners?

longText.longText: Forever, if you want to stop cooperating, you must give at least 30 days notice.

nodes.name: AdvisorRegisterFAQsItem7
nodes.shortText: Do I need continuous operation? How long will I be locked out of my account if I am inactive?

longText.longText: No. Uptime is flexible according to your partner's time, no fixed uptime is required. However, if your online frequency is too low, your customers can visit and choose other consultants, we encourage you to have a specific and regular schedule of activities.

nodes.name: AdvisorRegisterFAQsItem1
nodes.shortText: Can I set a price for my own services?

longText.longText: Yes. However, when you need to change the service price, please notify Unitz no later than the 25th of the previous month and it will be applied on the 1st of the following month. The partner will be able to change the price once a month.

nodes.name: AdvisorRegisterFAQsItem2
nodes.shortText: How many times a month can I withdraw money and on what days?

longText.longText: In a quarter when the partner makes transactions at Unitz.vn, the partner will be able to withdraw money 2 times in 1 month on the 15th and 30th of every month. Based on the closing amount of the previous 15 days.

detailText.detailText:

Step 5. Sign in again with the new password.

Health care (or healthcare) is the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease, illness, injury, and other physical and mental impairments in humans. Health care is delivered by practitioners in medicine, chiropractic, dentistry, nursing, pharmacy, allied health, and other care providers.

The raising and managing of funds by business organizations. Planning, analysis, and control operations are responsibilities of the financial manager, who is usually close to the top of the organizational structure of a firm. In very large firms, major financial decisions are often made by a finance committee. In small firms, the owner-manager usually conducts the financial operations. Much of the day-to-day work of business finance is conducted by lower-level staff; their work includes handling cash receipts and disbursements, borrowing from commercial banks on a regular and continuing basis, and formulating cash budgets.

Financial accounting is a process of gathering information and producing reports on an organization's financial activity. These statements summarize a company’s transactions, describe who the transaction is with and list the date and amount of each transaction. Companies create financial reports of transactions to render information on how much the organization is worth. Once they receive feedback from stakeholders, they can strategically plan the company's growth pattern.
